title: Looking for a Bronze group/team/club
body:
Just looking to get back into league very slowly, looking for a few like minded people in a low rating that wouldnt mind messing around and playing some games, ranked, 3s, flex whatever. Anyways let me know. 

IGN - AsphyxZe8

replies.body:
Hey

I am trying to get a bit of a team/community together for improving together.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/kaB0hk15-lets-make-an-improvement-focused-flex-teamcommunity-bronze-silver-gold
